sentence: Centrifuge at top speed for 5 minutes at room temperature
Decant cleared lysate into Spin Column
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds at room temperature
Reinsert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds at room temperature
Reinsert Spin Column into Collection Tube
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds at room temperature
Transfer Spin Column to a sterile 15 ml microcentrifuge tube
Centrifuge at top speed for 30 seconds at room temperature
